verses.verse: And 'Elohim <WH430> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> all these words <WH1697>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,
I am the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>, which have brought <WH3318> <WH8689> thee out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, out of the house <WH1004> of bondage <WH5650>.
Thou shalt have no other <WH312> 'elohim <WH430> before me <WH6440>.

Thou shalt not make <WH6213> <WH8799> unto thee any graven image <WH6459>, or any likeness <WH8544> of any thing that <WH834> is in heaven <WH8064> above <WH4605>, or that is in the earth <WH776> beneath, or that is in the water <WH4325> under the earth <WH776>:

Thou shalt not bow down <WH7812> <WH8691> thyself to them, nor serve <WH5647> <WH8714> them: for I the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> 'Elohim <WH410>, visiting <WH6485> <WH8802> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon the children <WH1121> unto the third <WH8029> and fourth <WH7256> generation of them that hate <WH8130> <WH8802> me;
And shewing <WH6213> <WH8802> mercy <WH2617> unto thousands <WH505> of them that love <WH157> <WH8802> me, and keep <WH8104> <WH8802> my Mitzvot <WH4687>.

Thou shalt not take <WH5375> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> in vain <WH7723>; for the YY <WH3068> will not hold him guiltless <WH5352> <WH8762> that taketh <WH5375> <WH8799> his name <WH8034> in vain <WH7723>.
Remember <WH2142> <WH8800> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>, to keep it holy <WH6942> <WH8763>.
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> shalt thou labour <WH5647> <WH8799>, and do <WH6213> <WH8804> all thy work <WH4399>:

But the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is the sabbath <WH7676> of the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430>: in it thou shalt not do <WH6213> <WH8799> any work <WH4399>, thou, nor thy son <WH1121>, nor thy daughter <WH1323>, thy manservant <WH5650>, nor thy maidservant <WH519>, nor thy cattle <WH929>, nor thy stranger <WH1616> that is within thy gates <WH8179>:

For in six <WH8337> days <WH3117> the YY <WH3068> made <WH6213> <WH8804> heaven <WH8064> and earth <WH776>, the sea <WH3220>, and all that in them is, and rested <WH5117> <WH8799> the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>: wherefore the YY <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> <WH8765> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>, and hallowed <WH6942> <WH8762> it.

Honour <WH3513> <WH8761> thy father <WH1> and thy mother <WH517>: that thy days <WH3117> may be long <WH748> <WH8686> upon the land <WH127> which the YY <WH3068> thy 'Elohim <WH430> giveth <WH5414> <WH8802> thee.
Thou shalt not kill <WH7523> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt not commit adultery <WH5003> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt not steal <WH1589> <WH8799>.
Thou shalt not bear <WH6030> <WH8799> false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> against thy neighbour <WH7453>.

Thou shalt not covet <WH2530> <WH8799> thy neighbour's <WH7453> house <WH1004>, thou shalt not covet <WH2530> <WH8799> thy neighbour's <WH7453> wife <WH802>, nor his manservant <WH5650>, nor his maidservant <WH519>, nor his ox <WH7794>, nor his ass <WH2543>, nor any thing that is thy neighbour's <WH7453>.

And all the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8802> the thunderings <WH6963>, and the lightnings <WH3940>, and the noise <WH6963> of the shofar <WH7782>, and the mountain <WH2022> smoking <WH6226>: and when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> it, they removed <WH5128> <WH8799>, and stood <WH5975> <WH8799> afar off <WH7350>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> thou with us, and we will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>: but let not 'Elohim <WH430> speak <WH1696> <WH8762> with us, lest we die <WH4191> <WH8799>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: for 'Elohim <WH430> is come <WH935> <WH8804> to <WH5668> prove <WH5254> <WH8763> you, and that his fear <WH3374> may be before your faces <WH6440>, that ye sin <WH2398> <WH8799> not.
And the people <WH5971> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> afar off <WH7350>, and Mosheh <WH4872> drew near <WH5066> <WH8738> unto the thick darkness <WH6205> where 'Elohim <WH430> was.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Thus thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8799> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Ye have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> that I have talked <WH1696> <WH8765> with you from heaven <WH8064>.
Ye shall not make <WH6213> <WH8799> with me 'elohim <WH430> of silver <WH3701>, neither shall ye make <WH6213> <WH8799> unto you 'elohim <WH430> of gold <WH2091>.

An altar <WH4196> of earth <WH127> thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH8799> unto me, and shalt sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8804> thereon thy burnt offerings <WH5930>, and thy peace offerings <WH8002>, thy sheep <WH6629>, and thine oxen <WH1241>: in all places <WH4725> where I record <WH2142> <WH8686> my name <WH8034> I will come <WH935> <WH8799> unto thee, and I will bless <WH1288> <WH8765> thee.

And if thou wilt make <WH6213> <WH8799> me an altar <WH4196> of stone <WH68>, thou shalt not build <WH1129> <WH8799> it of hewn stone <WH1496>: for if thou lift up <WH5130> <WH8689> thy tool <WH2719> upon it, thou hast polluted <WH2490> <WH8762> it.
Neither shalt thou go up <WH5927> <WH8799> by steps <WH4609> unto mine altar <WH4196>, that thy nakedness <WH6172> be not discovered <WH1540> <WH8735> thereon.
